name: Terrifying Countenance
prereq: Vigilante Dedication; Member Of The Gray Gardeners
summary: You can erect a magical cowl that terrorizes your enemies.
description:
You can erect a magical cowl that terrorizes your enemies. Once per day, you can cast mask of terror as an innate occult spell, targeting yourself. If you critically hit a creature that's temporarily immune to the spell, the creature's temporary immunity ends.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Vigilante: Using actions and abilities with the vigilante trait while in your social identity risks exposing you as a vigilante.
